alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 1:01PM AKST until February 10 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Reduced visibilities to one-half mile. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, from Dillingham north and west. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty northeasterly winds will continue, bringing significant visibility reductions in blowing snow. Visibility should improve by this afternoon as winds diminish.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
